title: "James Dean" for car safety.
subtitle: The rumors: Shortly before he died in a car accident, James Dean advised young car drivers to "take the easy drive - it may be the life that saves me."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Before he died in a car accident shortly, James Dean advised the minivans to "take it easy to drive, so it might be the life you saved me.
